Question: In early 2009, this person starred in the world premiere of Donald Margulies's Time Stands Still at the Geffen Playhouse LA.
Hints: This person continued her theatre work, next appearing in David Mamet's Boston Marriage and Speed-the-Plow.
This person later acknowledged that she hates the trappings of fame, saying, "Fame is not anything I wish on anyone.
After seeing this person in the three videos, filmmaker Amy Heckerling decided to cast her in Clueless.
